| HistoryText             = 
A group of carnival performers who had their souls stolen by the magician [[Moondark (Earth-616)|Moondark]] and turned into his mindless slaves. When the carnival was freed from Moondark by [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]] and [[Johnathon Blaze (Earth-616)|Ghost Rider]] and their souls returned, [[Six (Freaks) (Earth-616)|Six]], [[Muck Monster (Earth-616)|Muck Monster]], and [[Fahnbullah Eddy (Earth-616)|Gorilla Girl]] decided to form a superhero team called the Freaks.{{r|Marvel Team-Up Vol 1 91}}{{r|Marvel Tales Vol 2 256}}

In their only known outing as a team, the Freaks saved a doctor from being kidnapped by the villains [[Leroy Jackson (Earth-616)|Hammer]] and [[John Anvil (Earth-616)|Anvil]].{{r|Marvel Tales Vol 2 256}}
